title: Dragon Touched Full Series: Books 1-3
description: This book is the full Dragon Touched Series and Meeting the DragonLoving the DragonHealing the DragonMeeting the DragonA summons in the middle of the night has Shaman Lisa Reed unexpectedly on the front lines of an unknown enemy. When Dragon Touched, Max Tau is brought in by the Sidhe, Lisa finds herself unexpectedly and instantly attracted. Together they need to walk the line between their desire for each other, and battling an ancient enemy.Loving the DragonLisa and Max continue to balance their new relationship with their enemy still working in the shadows. Allies gather, and pitfalls abound, and glimmers of magnitude of what they face begin to appear.Healing the DragonAll barriers are stripped away, and Lisa and Max hold each other's hearts firmly in their hands. Will it be enough not just to overcome the final attack, but to survive it as well?
author: Louise Meyers
